alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:40AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN BRACKEN AND SOUTHEASTERN PENDLETON COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EDT... At 1139 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Falmouth, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Falmouth, Brooksville, Browning Corner, Neave, Bradford, Johnsville, Berlin, Mckinneysburg, Powersville and Lenoxburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northern Kentucky. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
